Paragraph: Clinical heterogeneity precluded meta - analysis for most outcomes .

Note: In the given paragraph, there is no explicit mention of any specific disease. The term "clinical heterogeneity" refers to the variability in clinical presentation, course, or response to treatment among individuals with the same diagnosis. Therefore, it is the only valid entity that can be identified from the paragraph.
